Work

Kickstarter backer tools

An overhaul of two features backers use to keep up with their backed projects.

A showcase of the best of Kickstarter during 2012.

Mizuno

A website redesign for one of the top manufacturers of sports equipment and apparel.

Moveline

Early versions of a product to help people find the best way to move their homes.

Jessica Harllee is a product designer at Etsy in Brooklyn, an avid crafter, and an amateur writer.
